# load packages and data needed
```{r}
library(Rcpp)
```


# test1: a simple add function
```{r}
cppFunction('int add(int x, int y, int z) {
  int sum = x + y + z;
  return sum;
}')
# add works like a regular R function
add

# use this function:
add(1,2,3)

```
